column2: In the last three months ...Have you often felt very nervous or uncomfortable when you have been with a group of children or young people say

column2: In the last three months ...Have you often felt very nervous when you've had to do things in front of people?

For this question
column3: I want to know if you have ever had a sudden attack of feeling very afraid. In the kind of attack I mean
column4: someone becomes very afraid even though there is nothing around them to frighten them. Sometimes they feel they can't breathe ... sometimes their hearts beat very fast.The attacks come on very suddenly and then go away
column5: but they get afraid that the attacks might come back.In the last three months ... have you had an attack when all of a sudden you felt you very afraid or strange?

column2: Have you had a time when you suddenly felt that you were suffocating or you couldn't breathe?

In the last three months ...Have you had a lot of headaches?
In the last three months ...Have you had a lot of other aches and pains?
Are you the kind of person who is often very tense
column3: or who finds it very hard to relax?

column2: In the last three months ...Have you been very afraid of dogs
column3: birds

column2: In the last three months ...Have you been very afraid of being high up or in a high place?

In the last three months ...Has seeing a needle or getting a shot made you much more afraid than other people?
In the last three months ...Has the sight of blood or cuts made you very afraid?
In the last three months ...Have you been very afraid of being on a bridge or in a tunnel or on a highway?
In the last three months ...Have you been very afraid of being in an elevator or on an escalator?
Some young people have times when one thought or idea comes into their mind over and over again. When people have these thoughts they usually get upset
column3: because the thoughts are strange. No matter how hard they try
column4: the thoughts keep coming back.Now I'm going to ask you if you have had thoughts like these in the last three months.Have you had to count things over and over again
column5: or make yourself do things a certain number of times?

column2: In the last three months ...Was there a time when you washed your hands or body over and over again or changed your clothes many times each day because you thought they were dirty?
In the last three months ...Have you often felt you should check on things over and over again?For example
column3: checking that the front door is locked ... or the stove is turned off ... or that something else was done even though you knew it had been done?

column2: In the last three months ...Have you often worried over and over again that things you touch are dirty or have germs?
In the last three months ...Have you had any other thoughts that kept coming into your mind over and over again that you couldn't get rid of?

These questions are about upsetting things that sometimes happen to people.Have you ever been in a natural disaster where you thought you were going to die or be seriously injured ... like a flood ... or a tornado ... or an earthquake ... or hurricane?
Have you ever been in a situation when you were attacked or hurt very badly?
Have you ever been in a situation when you thought you were going to die?
Has someone you are close to been attacked or hurt very badly?
Has anyone close to you ever died very suddenly?
Have you ever seen anyone be killed or die suddenly in front of you ... not on TV or in the movies?
In the last three months ...Has anyone worried that you were much too thin?
In the last three months ...Have you often felt bad about yourself because you thought you were fat or overweight?
In the last three months ...Have there been times when you thought about food or about eating almost all of the time?

Now I am going to ask you about eating binges. An eating binge is when someone stuffs themselves with a lot of food in a short time ... like several whole pizzas or a whole chocolate cake or several containers of ice cream ... and they don't seem to be able to control how much they eat.In the last three months ... have you had an eating binge like that?
In the last three months ...Has there been a time when nothing was fun for you and you just weren't interested in anything?
In the last three months ...Has there been a time when you had less energy than you usually do?
In the last three months ...Has there been a time when you felt you couldn't do anything well or that you weren't as good-looking or as smart as other people?
In the last three months ...Has there been a time when you thought seriously about killing yourself?
Have you tried to kill yourself in the last year?
In the last three months ...Has there been a time when doing even little things made you feel really tired?
In the last three months ... Has there been a time when you couldn't think as clearly or as fast as usual?
Everyone gets in a bad mood sometimes
column3: but some people feel grouchy or angry or irritable most of the time for several days in a row. They get really annoyed when other people interrupt them or don't agree with everything they say.In the last three months ... have you had a time when you've been grouchy or angry like this?

column5: or better than most other people?

column2: In the last three months ...Has there been a time when you often felt like your mind was racing too quickly from one thought to another?
Everyone has times when they have trouble concentrating or keeping their mind on what they are doing. What we want to know is whether you have had difficulty concentrating
column3: or keeping your mind on what you are doing
column4: most of the time. In the last three months
column5: have you often had trouble keeping your mind on what you were doing most of the time?

In the last three months ...Have you often made a lot of mistakes because it's hard for you to do things carefully?

column3: being hyperactive
